SEARCH
Module se1.bestellsystem
Package datamodel

Class Customer

Object
datamodel.Customer
public class Customer extends Object
Class of entity type Customer.

Customer is a person who creates and holds (owns) orders in the system.

Version:
"1.0.0-SNAPSHOT-F12-Refactoring"
Author:
"sgraupner"

      customer id, returns null, if id is unassigned

    • setId

      public Customer setId(long id)
      Id setter. Id can only be set once with valid id, id is immutable after assignment.
      Parameters:
      id - id value to assign if this.id attribute is still unassigned id < 0 and id argument is valid
      Returns:
      chainable self-reference
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if id argument is invalid (id < 0)

    • setName

      public Customer setName(String first, String last)
      Setter for first- ("Eric") and lastName ("Meyer") attributes.
      Parameters:
      first - value assigned to firstName attribute, null is ignored
      last - value assigned to lastName attribute, null is ignored
      Returns:
      chainable self-reference

    • setName

      public Customer setName(String name)
      Setter that splits a single-String name (e.g. "Eric Meyer") into first- and lastName parts and assigns parts to corresponding attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - single-String name to split into first- and lastName parts
      Returns:
      chainable self-reference
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if name argument is null

    • addContact

      public Customer addContact(String contact)
      Add new contact for Customer. Only valid contacts (not null, "" nor duplicates) are added. Null-arguments raise IllegalArgumentException.
      Parameters:
      contact - contact (not null or "" nor duplicate), invalid contacts are ignored
      Returns:
      chainable self-reference
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if contact argument is null or empty "" String

    • deleteContact

      public void deleteContact(int i)
      Delete the i-th contact with i >= 0 and i < contactsCount(), otherwise method has no effect.
      Parameters:
      i - index of contact to delete

    • deleteAllContacts

      public void deleteAllContacts()
      Delete all contacts.
